summary: Completed testing of Go-Live Workflow feature. Fixed missing route bug for Admin access to Go-Live Dashboard. All requested features verified working correctly.

details: Go-Live Dashboard page loads correctly at /hr/go-live for HR Manager role
Page shows 'Employee Go-Live Dashboard' title with description
Employee list displays 12 employees with data-testid attributes
Filter buttons (All, Pending, Active) visible and functional
GET /api/go-live/checklist/{employee_id} returns proper response
Response includes employee info, checklist items, CTC details, and go_live_request
Checklist items: onboarding_complete, ctc_approved, bank_details_added, bank_verified, documents_generated, portal_access_granted, go_live_status
Clicking employee shows Go-Live checklist panel
All checklist items display with proper status indicators (green check for complete)
CTC Details section shows annual CTC (â‚¹18.00 LPA)
Go-Live Request section shows status and submitter
'Not Ready for Go-Live' warning shows when requirements not met
Submit for Go-Live Approval button appears for HR users via data-testid='submit-golive-btn'
Button is disabled when CTC not approved or bank details missing
Button hidden when request already pending
Admin can see Go-Live Dashboard link in navigation sidebar
BUG FIXED: Added /go-live route to main ERP routes in App.js (was missing)
Admin sees 'Pending Go-Live Approvals' section with count
Admin sees View, Approve, and Reject buttons for pending requests
GET /api/go-live/pending returns list of pending requests for Admin
HR users correctly denied access (403 Forbidden)

critical_code_review_comments: server.py: Go-Live endpoints properly use 'global db' pattern to access database
GoLiveDashboard.js: Well-structured component with proper data-testid attributes for testing
ChecklistItem component shows clear visual distinction between complete/incomplete items

bug_fixed.issue: Admin Go-Live Dashboard route missing in main ERP
bug_fixed.fix: Added Route path='go-live' element={<GoLiveDashboard />} to main ERP routes at line 321
bug_fixed.root_cause: Layout.js had Go-Live Dashboard link at /go-live but App.js only had route defined in HR Portal at /hr/go-live

seed_data_creation: None - used existing data; one employee (EMP001 Rahul Kumar) has pending Go-Live request
context_for_next_testing_agent: Go-Live Dashboard is fully functional for both HR Manager (/hr/go-live) and Admin (/go-live). HR can view employee checklists and submit Go-Live requests. Admin can view pending approvals and approve/reject. One employee (Rahul Kumar - EMP001) has pending Go-Live request submitted by HR Manager. The employee is marked 'Not Ready for Go-Live' because bank details are required.
